verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> on <S%H5058>Neginoth<s%>, A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>. <S%H6030>Hear<s%> me when I <S%H7121>call<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: thou hast <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> me when I was in <S%H6862>distress<s%>; have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon me, and <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>. chief: or, overseer have: or, be gracious unto me

O ye <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%>, how <S%H5704>long<s%> will ye turn my <S%H3519>glory<s%> into <S%H3639>shame<s%>? how long will ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H7385>vanity<s%>, and <S%H1245>seek<s%> after <S%H3577>leasing<s%>? <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.

But <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath set <S%H6395>apart<s%> him that is <S%H2623>godly<s%> for himself: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> unto him.
Stand in <S%H7264>awe<s%>, and <S%H2398>sin<s%> not: <S%H559>commune<s%> with your own <S%H3824>heart<s%> upon your <S%H4904>bed<s%>, and be <S%H1826>still<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H2076>Offer<s%> the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, and put your <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

There be <S%H7227>many<s%> that <S%H559>say<s%>, Who will <S%H7200>shew<s%> us any <S%H2896>good<s%>? <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, lift thou <S%H5375>up<s%> the <S%H216>light<s%> of thy <S%H6440>countenance<s%> upon us.
Thou hast <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H8057>gladness<s%> in my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, more than in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that their <S%H1715>corn<s%> and their <S%H8492>wine<s%> <S%H7231>increased<s%>.
I will <S%H3162>both<s%> lay me <S%H7901>down<s%> in <S%H7965>peace<s%>, and <S%H3462>sleep<s%>: for thou, <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, <S%H910>only<s%> makest me <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%>.
